labels.text: This painting is based on a famous photograph of Mao Zedong meeting with peasants from his hometown Shaoshan, but the artist has replaced two figures with Deng Xiaopeng and Jiang Zemin. The presence of the three political leaders represent the staying power of the Chinese Communist Party during the second half of the twentieth century.

This painting is based on a famous photograph of Mao Zedong meeting with peasants from his hometown of Shaoshan, but the artist replaces two figures with Deng Xiaoping and Jiang Zemin. The presence of the three political leaders represents the staying power of the Chinese Communist Party during the second half of the twentieth century.
作品是根據一張著名歷史圖片創作而成，原照片中毛澤東與家鄉韶山的農民交談，但藝術家則在畫作把其中兩人改成鄧小平和江澤民。三位不同時代的領導人聚首一堂，象徵著中國共產黨在20世紀後半期的權力延展。

title.en: Chairman Mao in Discussion with the Peasants of Shaoshan
title.zh-hant: 毛主席在韶山和農民交談

images.AltText: Bright and colourful oil painting on canvas depicting Mao Zedong, Deng Xiaoping and Jiang Zemin seated in a living room with a smiling family. Several of the subjects wear clothing with floral patterns, and pink flowers with green leaves float across the canvas.
images.AltTextTC: 色彩鮮艷的油彩布本作品上，毛澤東、鄧小平及江澤民與一個家庭同坐客廳，家庭成員眉開眼笑。不少人都穿着花卉圖案服裝，畫面上飄浮着以綠葉襯托的粉紅色花朵。
